input_args.passage: 'List of Anglo-Welsh wars | 614 Battle of Beandun – The West Saxons led by Cynegils defeat the West Britons, possibly led by Tewdwr ap Peredur, at Badbury Rings, Dorset. In what is ...'
input_args.claim: 'To know the rank of Tewdwr ap Peredur, we need to look at context which states that Rhys ap Tewdwr was a king of Deheubarth in Wales.'
